headline: Brookfield man charged after fatal crash
author: Katelyn Amato
sentences: His passengers, 30-year-old Nicholas Holmes of Girard and 21-year-old Christopher Fox of Youngstown were killed.
Police say he was driving a box truck that crashed into a semi-tractor trailer on Interstate 71 last October.
(WKBN) â€“ A Brookfield man is now in the Trumbull County Jail, charged in a deadly crash.
Zachary Thomas Carpenter is charged with aggravated vehicular homicide and OVI.
Carpenter was taken to the hospital with injuries.
